version_description: * My PlayHome just doubled in size! Now you have *two* houses to play in!
* My PlayHome just doubled in size! Now you have *two* houses to play in!

v3.1.0: My PlayHome just doubled in size! Now you have *two* houses to play in!
v3.1.1: Small fixes

v3.1.0: My PlayHome just doubled in size! Now you have *two* houses to play in!
v3.1.1: Small fixes

* Added a backyard to the new house! Happy grilling!
* Fixed a few PartnerPlay bugs

* Added a backyard to the new house! Happy grilling!
* Fixed a few PartnerPlay bugs
Added a fix for saved games disappearing on iOS 11.
Added a fix for saved games disappearing on iOS 11.

* Added grandparents
* Added baby's room to the new house to the right of the green kid's room

* Added grandparents
* Added baby's room to the new house to the right of the green kid's room
Fixed a bug to do with balloons when using PartnerPlay mode.
Fixed a bug to do with balloons when using PartnerPlay mode.
Added a pet dog!!!!!!!
Added a pet dog!!!!!!!
Added a pet dog!!!!!!!
Added a pet dog!!!!!!!
Fixed the title screen for newer iPads.
Fixed the title screen for newer iPads.
Fixed bug in previous update that caused the game to reset when reentering the app after using other apps in the PlayHome series.
Fixed bug in previous update that caused the game to reset when reentering the app after using other apps in the PlayHome series.

* Added rain! Just tap the sun icon in the game to change the weather.
* Faster game loading and app switching. We've completely changed the way games are saved to make things faster and also so we can add new things in the future without resetting your game.
